meanings.definition: The act of wearing a disguise or costume, especially for Halloween.
meanings.sent1: During Halloween, many children enjoy guising by dressing up in fun costumes.
meanings.sent2: Guising is a popular activity on Halloween, where people wear different outfits.
meanings.sent3: The guising at the Halloween party made it hard to recognize my friends.
meanings.sent4: Her guising as a ghost was so convincing that she scared everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The colorful guising of the kids brightened up the neighborhood on Halloween night.

meanings.definition: To go from house to house in costume, asking for treats.
meanings.sent1: Every Halloween, kids love guising around the neighborhood for candies.
meanings.sent2: Children often go guising in their favorite costumes to collect sweets.
meanings.sent3: The siblings had a blast guising and collecting treats from friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent4: She guised as a witch and cast a spell of joy on every house she visited.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of guising for treats filled the air with laughter and happiness.
